title: I need help
body: I need a good adc for me to support to get out of bronze 5, personally i dont think i should belong here but with the teams i get i cant really do much. Ive tried to play other roles and have gotten some good adcs and i win, but after a few wins i just lose cuz i get bad teams. i need someone to help me and get me out of b5 and even better bronze or better. im not new to the game i just havnt played much and just got back. Having friends that you know youre better then (they just started) and somehow get better rank then me really annoys me so please help?

replies.body:
Hey,

I am silver 4...

I went from silver 1 back to b5 to help a friend get out of bronze...yet he went back to bronze.

Probably because theres a few essentials that separate bronze players and silver players?..

you dont need to play supp in bronze, main mid or top and pub stomp your way out of bronze once you're in gold then main support... 

Hope that helps
Is it specifically adc? If not I can add u on my smurf as I main mid. I know the feeling as I was once trapped in bronze. Failed my bronze 4 promos 4 times before going on a winning streak to gold
i dont mind just get me out of bronze hell
hey add me we can play together
nah no thanks, I only duo on my smurf with supp players as its hard for them to climb alone (and because they're nice people)
!!! I only play on Fridays and the weekends and occasionally on my smurf so when I do I will hit you up
LOL ain't you a nice guy
If you want to get out of bronze, Main a champion that fits your playstyle. Works every time {{champion:11}}
brb will look at your match history after work.
play hyper carry, 30 kills, profit? win 1vs9
